name: Cells (Petros Ioannidis)
description:
Cells is a physics-based puzzle game where you try to escape getting consumed by the guardians. Use your cells to hide and control your speed.

Controls:

W - Up S - Down A - Left D - Right Space - Toggle between Spawning and Gathering cells R - Restart level Esc - Exit game

Cells was developed during the Godot Wild Jam 36.
